area.description: The grid-area CSS property. Not provided by default.

center.description: Horizontally align the text contents of the cell. Default is false.

height.description: Cell height in units, default is 1.

left.description: The grid-column-start CSS property. Not provided by default.

middle.description: Vertically align the contents of the cell. Default is false.

top.description: The grid-row-start CSS property. Not provided by default.

width.description: Cell width in units, default is 1.
